request.acceptance_interval_comment: Unit: Milliseconds. DOS protection interval. Setting it to 1 will allow up to 1000 requests per second. 2 will allow 500 etc.
request.confirmation_hold_comment: Unit: Seconds. The value defines the period needed for the system to initiate a transaction after the funds received. Must be 3600
request.timeout_comment: Unit: Seconds. In case the funds are not received during the period the request will be considered timed out. Set it to 1209600 for 14 days
request.queue_processing_interval_comment: Unit: Seconds. Must be set to 1 second. Other values are for debugging reason only
request.max_tokens_per_interval_comment: Must be 2000. Other values for debugging reason only
request.rejected_countries_comment: Rejected countries codes as defined in ISO_3166-2 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2

bitcoin.fee_comment: 'fee' defines the amount in satoshis to be paid for a transaction

ethereum.fee_comment: 'fee' defines the amount in Weis to be paid for a transaction
